title: Microsoft Negotiates Broadcom Deal for Custom Azure AI Chips, Replacing Marvell
description: Microsoft is negotiating with Broadcom to replace Marvell in designing custom chips for Azure cloud and AI infrastructure, aiming to diversify suppliers and enhance efficiency amid the AI boom. This aligns with Microsoft's push for proprietary hardware like Maia accelerators. The move could reshape industry partnerships and boost innovation in AI computing.

title: Canadian politician arrested after claiming threatening voicemail was AI
description: Ontario councilor Corinna Traill faces criminal charges for allegedly threatening to kill a former mayoral candidate and assault his wife in a disturbing voicemail.

title: Datametrex AI (CVE:DM) Trading Down 15% – What’s Next?
description: Datametrex AI Limited (CVE:DM – Get Free Report) shares were down 15% on Friday . The company traded as low as C$0.09 and last traded at C$0.09. title: Content Discontent: NYT Raises More Legal Questions On 'Answer Engine' Perplexity In AI Copyright Clash
